he 6th or 7th Gen Akasaka line, though unsure who in that line may have mad=
e it.

A few months back I took it to a trip to Melbourne and showed it to =
some friends and our local Kod=F4gu expert there believed it was early Akas=
aka, maybe around the time of the 2 - 4th gen.

It is Wak sized and about 4=
mm thick. Any thought's ?
